args.natural_language_statement: Let f : ‚Ñù^n ‚Üí ‚Ñù be differentiable at x0. Show that ‚Äñ‚àá f(x0)‚Äñ = sup { |Df(x0) h| : ‚Äñh‚Äñ = 1 }. (That is, the gradient has norm equal to the operator norm of the derivative.) Save file jirilebl_ra_ch-several-vars-ders_2843.lean

retrieved_examples.nl: The gradient of a differentiable function equals the Riesz representation of its derivative; i.e. fderiv at x is a continuous_linear_map given by inner product with ‚àáf.
retrieved_examples.lean:
import Mathlib

variable {E : Type*} [InnerProductSpace ‚Ñù E]

theorem fderiv_eq_inner (f : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù) {x : E} (h : DifferentiableAt ‚Ñù f x) :
  fderiv ‚Ñù f x = (ContinuousLinearMap.inner (‚àá f x)) := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-!
Let f : ‚Ñù^n ‚Üí ‚Ñù be differentiable at x0. Show that ‚Äñ‚àá f(x0)‚Äñ = ‚Äñfderiv ‚Ñù f x0‚Äñ.
(That is, the gradient has norm equal to the operator norm of the derivative.)
-/-

theorem gradient_norm_eq_deriv_norm {n : ‚Ñï} {f : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {x0 : Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù}
  (hd : DifferentiableAt ‚Ñù f x0) :
  ‚Äñ‚àá f x0‚Äñ = ‚Äñfderiv ‚Ñù f x0‚Äñ := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-!
Let f : ‚Ñù^n ‚Üí ‚Ñù be differentiable at x0. Show that ‚Äñgradient f x0‚Äñ = ‚Äñfderiv ‚Ñù f x0‚Äñ.
(That is, the gradient has norm equal to the operator norm of the derivative.)
-/-

theorem gradient_norm_eq_deriv_norm {n : ‚Ñï} {f : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {x0 : Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù}
  (hd : DifferentiableAt ‚Ñù f x0) :
  ‚Äñgradient f x0‚Äñ = ‚Äñfderiv ‚Ñù f x0‚Äñ := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-!
Let f : ‚Ñù^n ‚Üí ‚Ñù be differentiable at x0. Show that the norm of the gradient
equals the operator norm of the derivative, i.e.

  ‚Äñgradient f x0‚Äñ = ‚Äñfderiv ‚Ñù f x0‚Äñ.

We state the result for an arbitrary inner product space E over ‚Ñù; this
recovers the ‚Ñù^n case by taking E = Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù.
-/

theorem gradient_norm_eq_deriv_norm {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [InnerProductSpace ‚Ñù E]
  {f : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {x0 : E} (hd : DifferentiableAt ‚Ñù f x0) :
  ‚Äñgradient f x0‚Äñ = ‚Äñfderiv ‚Ñù f x0‚Äñ := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-!
Let f : ‚Ñù^n ‚Üí ‚Ñù be differentiable at x0. Show that the norm of the gradient
equals the operator norm of the derivative, i.e.

  ‚Äñgradient f x0‚Äñ = ‚Äñfderiv ‚Ñù f x0‚Äñ.

We state the result for an arbitrary inner product space E over ‚Ñù; this
recovers the ‚Ñù^n case by taking E = Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù.
-/

theorem gradient_norm_eq_deriv_norm {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [InnerProductSpace ‚Ñù E]
  [CompleteSpace E] {f : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {x0 : E} (hd : DifferentiableAt ‚Ñù f x0) :
  ‚Äñgradient f x0‚Äñ = ‚Äñfderiv ‚Ñù f x0‚Äñ := by sorry
